message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, however, the value of this product is quite high. Could we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
